alternatives.title: Network Segmentation
alternatives.description: Isolate the affected PLC in a separate VLAN with strict firewall rules to prevent unauthorized access from corporate network.
steps: Create dedicated VLAN for industrial control network
Block all traffic except whitelisted IPs

alternatives.title: Disable Unused Services
alternatives.description: Disable unnecessary network services and protocols on the PLC to reduce attack surface.
steps: Disable HTTP/HTTPS web server if not used

alternatives.title: Strict Authentication
alternatives.description: Implement strong password policies and role-based access control for PLC access.
steps: Enable account lockout after 3 failed attempts

alternatives.title: Protocol Firewall
alternatives.description: Deploy industrial protocol firewall to inspect and filter Modbus traffic.

alternatives.title: Air Gap Critical Systems
alternatives.description: Physically isolate critical Modbus devices from external networks.
steps: Use USB for firmware updates only
Implement one-way data diode for SCADA

alternatives.title: DMZ Architecture
alternatives.description: Place HMI in DMZ zone between corporate and control networks.
steps: Implement jump server for remote access

alternatives.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
alternatives.description: Implement 2FA for all HMI access to prevent unauthorized logins.
